scripts.start:dev: docker compose --profile dev-core down; docker compose --profile dev-core up --build
scripts.start:dev:detatched: docker compose --profile dev-core down; docker compose --profile dev-core up -d --build
scripts.tools:updateLatestDrizzleMigrationHash: docker compose run --rm --build tool bun tools.ts updateLatestDrizzleMigrationHash
scripts.db:reset: docker compose run -it --rm --build tool bun tools.ts nukeDbAndReset
scripts.db:migrations:generate: docker compose run --rm --build tool bunx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:migrations:generateCustom: docker compose run --rm --build tool bunx drizzle-kit generate --custom
scripts.db:migrations:migrate: docker compose run --rm --build tool bunx drizzle-kit migrate; bun run tools:updateLatestDrizzleMigrationHash
